sentences: Kus vai pääseb, kui nui pihta annab.
A. H. Tammsaare on öelnud: "Oled küll õppimisega pisut hiljaks jäänud, aga anna pihta, küllap jõuad."
context: The Estonian word 'anname' is the first-person plural present indicative form of the verb 'andma', meaning 'to give'. It specifically refers to the action that 'we' are performing in the present tense. This verb can be used literally (to physically hand something over) or figuratively (to provide help, support, or time). In the given example sentences, it appears in contexts of giving blows/criticism and dedicating oneself to work.
